name: Forbidden Campgrounds
description:
COMPLETE THE RITUAL

Forbidden Campgrounds is a horror game where you must explore a desolate campground for supplies to go to a better place. Except... every time you enter, the map changes.

Find all of your Supplies and return to your tent while avoiding it. 

Don't look at it for too long either, or it'll move and put you into shock. Find Permanent Items and Syringes to help you get back without getting caught...
- Play on 3 difficulties!
- Some unlockables!
- Different endings for each difficulty!
- Achievements!
- Secrets!
- Items!
- And More!

Currently, the game is only in alpha (very early build), and most of the story will be hidden in-game in the full version. But I'll tell you this... you're seeing things...

KeyActionWASDMove
Left ShiftSprintLeft ClickCollectEItems MenuSpaceToggle FlashlightEscapePause (See Supplies  & Permanent Items)

Okay, so this may seem like a generic slender-clone, and yeah it kinda is... but in the future, I plan to make this game much more challenging and different with more secrets, items, enemies, and a bigger map. And naming the main antagonist "it" is overdone and unoriginal, so I'm working on that...

This is one of the first games I made with mostly Custom Music! So, if your ears are bleeding, that's why! 30+ Tracks/Short Themes with more in the future! I would have put notifications in-game containing updates and stuff, but Unity needs to update their assets and once that happens I'll add it in soon enough.

Heavily influenced by Slender and The Binding of Issac, this project began in February 2018, and it was mainly all made by one person (me), so... it's not perfect!

Lastly, I've encountered a few serious bugs that I'll patch later that make the game too easy, so enjoy it while you can!

Anyway, thanks for reading and I hope you enjoy the game!
